actions.text: Mr. Lewis of California rose to a question of the privileges of the House and sent to the desk a resolution.
Mr. Gephardt moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by recorded vote: 250 - 161 (Roll no. 7).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Creating a Select Committee to Investigate Certain Allegations Concerning the House Post Office.

summary.text: Creates a Select Committee to Investigate Allegations Concerning the House Post Office. Requires the Committee to: (1) investigate, study, and make findings with respect to specified allegations and matters; (2) make recommendations to the Speaker and minority leader regarding the implementation of an improved system of oversight to prevent the repetition of any improper or illegal conduct it finds; and (3) report to the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct evidence of such conduct it finds by any Member, officer, or employee of the House.

titles.title: Creating a Select Committee to Investigate Certain Allegations Concerning the House Post Office.
